full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Consumer Identity Reports**

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites bids for a contract to access a consumer credit report database for extracting consumer identity information. This resource will support CRA research processes necessary for protecting Canada's revenue base.

**Contract Details**

* Contract duration: Four (4) years, with four (4) one-year option periods
* Estimated annual searches: 125,000 to 150,000
* Minimum spend commitment: $28,200.00
* Period of contract: Four (4) years, with four (4) one-year option periods

**Bid Requirements**

* Bids must be submitted via the Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation
* Proposal documents and supporting information must be submitted in either English or French
* To be considered, bids must meet all mandatory evaluation criteria
* The responsive bid with the lowest bid evaluation price will be considered the highest ranked bidder

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

The CRA reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. A conditional set-aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business may apply. Interested Indigenous businesses must certify their eligibility and comply with program requirements.

**Security Requirements**

This requirement is associated with security requirements. Bidders are advised to consult the bid solicitation document for additional information.

**Additional Documents**

Refer to the bid solicitation document for detailed requirements and specifications.

**Contact Information**

For questions and further information, please contact:

Samuel Snow
Canada Revenue Agency
Email: [samuel.snow@cra.gc.ca](mailto:samuel.snow@cra.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 324-0047
Note: Bids must not be submitted via email to this address. Please initiate a Connect conversation to submit your proposal.

The CRA encourages suppliers to review the bid solicitation document carefully to ensure compliance with all requirements and specifications.

[Please click on the attachment link for additional document links](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7661/amendment-002.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7661/amendment-004.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7661/rfp_1000442172.pdf)
